title: Drawing, Leigh B. Block Apartment: Revised Plans, Solarium, February 19, 1936
title_raw: Leigh B. Block Apartment: Revised Plans, Solarium
medium: Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 537-4/ 1/2"-1'0/ Block-Chic., E.W./ 2/19/36, 2/19/36, 11/ L & B Block; inscribed in graphite above stamp: REVISED PLAN OF SOLARIUM FOR/LEIGH BLOCK CHICAGO; inscribed in red color pencil, upper left: NOTE!/RED LINES REPRESENT ORIGINAL SCHEME
description: Plan for solarium showing edits to original scheme. Entrance to room at center of north wall; buffet, record storage, phonograph, and radio at right of door against north wall. Sofa along south east corner and south wall, curving at corner. Circular aquarium in front of sofa near right; flower trough begin sofa in corner. Flower trough along left side of south wall with lights underneath. Bar perpendicular to west wall and curving near north wall; five circular bar stools facing bar. Back bar behind bar with glass shelves. Flower trough along north wall at left; L-shaped storage cabinet perpendicular to north wall with sofa placed in inner corner of cabinet. Reflector lights in storage unit.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Leigh B. Block Apartment: Revised Plans, Solarium, February 19, 1936. Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. 
Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-580
